Title: The Brigade's Ducks
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Example of a painting by a peasant from rural Huxian district. The Huxian peasant painters are propagated as examples of the innate genius of the people. In reality, these amateur artists are helped by professionals who have been sent to the countryside to 'learn from the peasants'.BG E15/81 is a Chinese-only edition.
